title: Grounding Schema
description: This schema defines the Grounding part of a Service Description.

grounding.description: The part of a service description that describes the means by which the service is invoked, including the underlying technology protocols and network locations of the service.

binding.description: A specification of the protocol and data format to be used in transmitting messages defined by the associated interface.

properties.description: A document containing a formal set of rules governing data encoding and coordination for data exchange among components.
A value that indicates the type of interactions addressed by the protocol.

end-point.description: An association between a fully-specified binding and a physical point (i.e., a network address) at which the service may be accessed.

name.description: The name of the end point.

description.description: A description of the end point.

interface-name.description: The name of the interface accessible via the end-point

location.description: A physical point at which the service may be accessed.
